title: What are three statements you consider as moral realism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not sure about any a realism Yesh BUT as certain ancients have put it some time ago now which I do think today it still holds, in matters of morality reality must always be sought to which all our efforts must be directed, which’s to say one's got the obligation to find something real otherwise, like if it’s only ideas, beliefs, thoughts or farts within the radius of the mere headspace that they rest or are left with but no reality then that’s anything but moral. Or to say it in lingo only a certain kind of person very special would ever talk and also enjoy listening to, the idea of morality is necessarily real.
